coreAttributes.name: arcane karada
coreAttributes.description: A length of rope which, thanks to a special enchantment, ties itself into a tight harness that loops around the wearer's neck, around their body, and under their crotch.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(hang)] the enchanted rope around [npc.her] neck, whereupon it instantly starts to snake and slide around [npc.her] body with a mind of its own, forming a tight karada within a matter of seconds.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(hang)] the enchanted rope around [npc2.namePos] neck, whereupon it instantly starts to snake and slide around [npc2.her] body with a mind of its own, forming a tight karada within a matter of seconds.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(loop)] the enchanted rope around [npc2.namePos] neck, whereupon it instantly starts to snake and slide around [npc2.her] body with a mind of its own, forming a tight karada within a matter of seconds.
